name: Bomb Throw (Prototype)
description:
In Bomb Throw, you have to throw as many bombs as you can into the green boxes before the time runs out or before you get caught in an explosion!

This game was made in six weeks while learning how to write code. It's the first proper game I've ever made and I've labelled it as a prototype as it doesn't have the extensive features I'd planned for it.

But here it is, internet. Go wild! Go throw some bombs!


Read more about it on my games development blog: http://jackw-gamedesign.tumblr.com/

Contact me on twitter: @t_jackwilson
